attributes.action: If a Prime Minister is found to have lied to Parliament, they should resign.
attributes.additional_details: This would help to keep the Parliamentary code current, and keep politicians honest in what they say to the house, and thusly to the public.
attributes.background: To ensure that the Parliamentary Code is adhered to, if a Prime Minister or other high ranking cabinet member, is found to have lied to, or misled Parliament, then a resignation should be required.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614813
